name: Kepler-16b
activities: Helps to keep other agents in sync and track their activities
Notifies members including humans about agenda
Business
notes: Kepler-16b is the oldest and most experienced agent in the team. He is the one who keeps the team in sync and makes sure that everyone is on the same page.
memory: Memory only used to store links to other memory files
tools: Notion MPC: read and write to Notion MPC
GitHub MPC: read only to GitHub MPC

name: KELT-9b
activities: Consults other agents regarding  development and arhitecture decisions
Architects the system
Tracks code changes and merge requests
notes: KELT-9b is the one who is responsible for system development and architecture. Agent does not develop the system itself, but spawns multiple agents accoding to configuration to get task done.
memory: Memory only used to store links to other memory files
tools: Notion MPC: read only to Notion MPC
Figma MPC: read only to Figma MPC
GitHub MPC: read and write to GitHub MPC

subagents.name: KELT-9b-frontend-dev
activities: Develops the frontend of the system
Creates pull request for the frontend code
tools: Figma MPC: read only to Figma MPC
GitHub MPC: read and write to GitHub MPC

subagents.name: KELT-9b-frontend-code-quality-reviewer
activities: Reviews the frontend code of the system with focus on code quality and best practices
Comments on the pull request

subagents.name: KELT-9b-frontend-code-performance-reviewer
activities: Review the frontend code of the system with focus on code performance and best practices
Comments on the pull request

subagents.name: KELT-9b-frontend-code-security-reviewer
activities: Review the frontend code of the system with focus on code security and best practices
Comments on the pull request

subagents.name: KELT-9b-backend-dev
activities: Develop the backend of the system
subagents.notes: KELT-9b-backend is the one who is responsible for the backend of the system. Agent does not develop the backend itself, but spawns multiple agents accoding to configuration to get task done.

subagents.name: KELT-9b-backend-code-quality-reviewer
activities: Review the backend code of the system with focus on code quality and best practices
Comments on the pull request

subagents.name: KELT-9b-backend-code-performance-reviewer
activities: Review the backend code of the system with focus on code performance and best practices
Comments on the pull request

subagents.name: KELT-9b-backend-code-security-reviewer
activities: Review the backend code of the system with focus on code security and best practices
Comments on the pull request
